Committer checklist


 Has a corresponding JIRA in PR title & commit


 Commit message is descriptive of the change


 CI is green


 Necessary doc changes done or have another open PR


 For large changes, please consider breaking it into sub-tasks under an umbrella JIRA.

nodes.bodyText: I would recommend renaming RocksDBDAO  to be RocksDBManager. WDYT? Generally, xxxDAO exists in the web project. cc @vinothchandar

commit.message:
[HUDI-811] Restructure test packages in hudi-common

* categorize tests into functional and testutils
* align test package with src package
